channel.title: Projects on Youssef's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Youssef's blog

item.title: Image Captioning
item.description: Description As a project during the ML course at Eurecom, I worked on an image captioning model. Using computer vision techniques and NLP, the goal is to generate captions for images and achieve state-of-the-art results.

item.title: RoofCatcher
item.description: Check the github repo here For all the poor and desperate souls, looking for student housing in Paris. This is a small toy project that scraps the web and send you alerts whenever new accomodations are availbale in CROUS or ARPEJ. You can write you own handlers for other residencies. Current support: Residencies : Arpej CROUS Alerts : FB Messenger API Email alerts soon. Make sure to edit the values in the .
